text: وَلَقَدْ كَتَبْنَا فِى ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱلذِّكْرِ أَنَّ ٱلْأَرْضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِىَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And We have already written in the book [of Psalms] after the [previous] mention that the land [of Paradise] is inherited by My righteous servants.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sungguh telah Kami tulis didalam Zabur sesudah (Kami tulis dalam) Lauh Mahfuzh, bahwasanya bumi ini dipusakai hamba-hamba-Ku yang saleh.
